snippet: An evidence unit carried several large paper bags up from the basement where Pedro Hernandez told investigators he killed the 6-year-old in 1979.
abstract: An evidence unit carried several large paper bags up from the basement where Pedro Hernandez told investigators he killed the 6-year-old in 1979.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and RANDY LEONARD

headline.main: Police Return to Cellar Tied to Patz Suspect
headline.print_headline: Police Return to Cellar Tied to Patz Case
